attributes.action: Restart all local elections and by-elections
attributes.additional_details: To allow residents in their constituencies  to have a democratic choice over the local councils. Democracy delayed is democracy denied
attributes.background: Due to the successional cancellation of local elections in potential Mayoral constituencies, parliament should reinstate local elections until 2028 when the Mayoral elections begin.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/751384
